arts.title: Photography
arts.artist: Ansel Adams, Diane Arbus, and Henri Cartier-Bresson.
arts.text: Photography involves using a camera to capture images of the world around us. It has become an increasingly popular form of art in recent years, as technology has made it easier for anyone to take high-quality photos. Photographs can be used to document events, capture moments in time, or create works of art that explore themes such as identity, culture, and social justice
